nodes.text: White Judgment Seats were a formal setting where Patriels and Councilors of families of Chiss rendered official judgment in non-criminal disputes.
Councilor Lakuviv of the Xodlak family had his White Judgment Seat at Redhill Hall in the planet Celwis's Redhill province. Patriel Xodlak'oo'nifis had hers in Brickwalk.
